about.headline: About Me
about.description: Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based near Hamburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about.location: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Hamburg and remotely.
about.improvement: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about.motivation: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skills.headline: Skills
skills.description-small-viewport: I have gained experience in building projects with various frontend technologies and concepts.
skills.description-large-viewport: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skills.contact-me: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

portfolio.headline: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

EL POLLO LOCO.name: EL POLLO LOCO
EL POLLO LOCO.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

JOIN.name: JOIN
JOIN.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

POKEDEX.name: POKEDEX
POKEDEX.description: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

testimonial.testimonial-one: Patrick really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
testimonial.testimonial-two: Paddy was a top team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility made a significant contribution to us achieving our goals.
testimonial.testimonial-three: It was a great pleasure to work with Patrick. He knows how to push and encourage team members to present the best work possible, always adding something to brainstorm. Regarding the well-being of group members, he was always present and available to listen and help others, with a great sense of humor as well

contact.headline: Contact
contact.contact-me: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

contactform.confirm-policy: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

legal-notice.created-with: Created with the free privacy policy generator from Dr. Thomas Schwenke
